TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServicePoint extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 HTTP 連接的連接管理。

span.span: Provides connection management for HTTP connections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別處理傳遞中資源的統一資源識別元 (URI) 的主機資訊為基礎的網際網路資源的連接。The class handles connections to an Internet resource based on the host information passed in the resource's Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). 資源的初始連接判定資訊的物件維護，這就會共用該資源的所有後續要求。The initial connection to the resource determines the information that the object maintains, which is then shared by all subsequent requests to that resource. 物件由類別，並建立，如有必要，由方法。 objects are managed by the class and are created, if necessary, by the method. 物件永遠不會直接建立，但永遠建立和管理由類別。 objects are never created directly but are always created and managed by the class. 最大數目可以建立的物件由設定屬性。The maximum number of objects that can be created is set by the property. 每個物件會維護與網際網路資源的連接直到已閒置超過指定的時間屬性。Each object maintains its connection to an Internet resource until it has been idle longer than the time specified in the property. 當超過值，它可以是回收，以另一個連接。When a exceeds the value, it can be recycled to another connection. 預設值由設定屬性。The default value of is set by the property. 當屬性設定為-1，且指定的時間之後結束作用中以外的值它所服務的下一個要求之後，連接關閉。When the property is set to a value other than -1, and after the specified time elapses, an active connection is closed after it services the next request. 這非常有用，因為它們是依預設不需要無限期地開啟的作用中連線的應用程式。This is useful for applications that do not require active connections that are opened indefinitely, as they are by default. > [!NOTE] > 在高負載情況下，某些應用程式可能會用完可用的執行緒中執行緒集區，可能會導致系統效能很低 （例如高和變數的交易時間）。In high load conditions, some applications may run out of free threads in the ThreadPool, which may lead to poor system performance (such as high and variable transaction times). 請參閱[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/dnpag/html/scalenetchapt17.asp ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/dnpag/html/scalenetchapt17.asp)數目的組態變更，您可以對修正此問題。See [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/dnpag/html/scalenetchapt17.asp](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/dnpag/html/scalenetchapt17.asp) for a number of configuration changes you can make to fix this issue. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立物件來連接到 URI www.contoso.com。The following code example creates a object that connects to the URI www.contoso.com. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#1)]

value.span: 類別的執行個體，包含這個 物件連接之網際網路伺服器的 URI。

span.span: An instance of the class that contains the URI of the Internet server that this object connects to.

span.span: The is in host mode.

permission.span: 使用如果透過 proxy 伺服器連接。

span.span: For using if the connects through a proxy server.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::BindIPEndPoint ^ BindIPEndPointDelegate { System::Net::BindIPEndPoint ^ get(); void set(System::Net::BindIPEndPoint ^ value); };

summary.span: 指定使本機 與 產生關聯的委派。

span.span: Specifies the delegate to associate a local with a .

value.span: 一種委派，可強制 使用特定的本機網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 位址和連接埠編號。

span.span: A delegate that forces a to use a particular local Internet Protocol (IP) address and port number.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些負載平衡技術需要用戶端使用特定本機 IP 位址和通訊埠編號，而非(或的網際網路通訊協定第 6 版) 和暫時的連接埠。Some load balancing techniques require a client to use a specific local IP address and port number, rather than (or for Internet Protocol Version 6) and an ephemeral port. 您可以滿足此需求。Your can satisfy this requirement.

span.span: for binding to a local port.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Certificate As X509Certificate

summary.span: 取得為這個 物件接收的憑證。

span.span: Gets the certificate received for this object.

value.span: 類別的執行個體，包含為這個 物件接收的安全性憑證。

span.span: An instance of the class that contains the security certificate received for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然物件會讓對網際網路資源的多個連接時，它可以維護只有一個憑證。Although a object can make multiple connections to an Internet resource, it can maintain only one certificate. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. value.span: 物件，包含傳送到伺服器之最後用戶端憑證的公用值。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool CloseConnectionGroup(string connectionGroupName) cil managed
Public Function CloseConnectionGroup (connectionGroupName As String) As Boolean

param.name: connectionGroupName
param.span: 連接群組的名稱，這個連接群組包含要從這個服務點關閉和移除的連接。

span.span: The name of the connection group that contains the connections to close and remove from this service point.

summary.span: 將指定的連接群組從這個 物件移除。

span.span: Removes the specified connection group from this object.

returns.span: 值，指出連接群組是否已關閉。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the connection group was closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連線群組會要求一組關聯的特定連線或連線集。Connection groups associate a set of requests with a particular connection or set of connections. 這個方法會移除，並關閉所有屬於指定的連接群組的連線。This method removes and closes all connections that belong to the specified connection group.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ConnectionLeaseTimeout { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定作用中 連接關閉前的毫秒數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds after which an active connection is closed.

value.span: ，指定作用中 連接維持開啟的毫秒數。

span.span: A that specifies the number of milliseconds that an active connection remains open.

value.span: 預設值為 -1，這允許作用中 連接無限期保持連接。

span.span: The default is -1, which allows an active connection to stay connected indefinitely.

value.span: 將這個屬性設為 0，可以強制 連接在服務要求之後關閉。

span.span: Set this property to 0 to force connections to close after servicing a request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性，以確保物件的作用中連線不會持續開啟無限期。You can use this property to ensure that a object's active connections do not remain open indefinitely. 這個屬性適用於案例應該卸除並重新建立定期，例如負載平衡案例連線。This property is intended for scenarios where connections should be dropped and reestablished periodically, such as load balancing scenarios. 根據預設，當是`true`要求，屬性會設定用於關閉逾時因為無活動的連線。By default, when is `true` for a request, the property sets the time-out for closing connections due to inactivity. 如果有使用中連接時，沒有任何作用，而且連接無限期地保持開啟。If the has active connections, has no effect and the connections remain open indefinitely. 當屬性設定為-1，且指定的時間之後結束作用中以外的值藉由設定服務要求之後關閉連接至`false`該要求中。When the property is set to a value other than -1, and after the specified time elapses, an active connection is closed after servicing a request by setting to `false` in that request. 設定這個值會影響所管理的所有連線物件。Setting this value affects all connections managed by the object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定這個屬性的值。The following code example sets the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLServicePoint/CPP/nclservicepoint.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLServicePoint/CS/nclservicepoint.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLServicePoint/VB/nclservicepoint.vb#1)]

exception.span: 為設定作業指定的值是小於 -1 的負數。

span.span: The value specified for a set operation is a negative number less than -1.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ConnectionLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個 物件上所允許的最大連接數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of connections allowed on this object.

value.span: 這個 物件上所允許的最大連接數目。

span.span: The maximum number of connections allowed on this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定的連線數目上限，物件可以對網際網路資源。The property sets the maximum number of connections that the object can make to an Internet resource. 值屬性設定的值為屬性時建立物件; 後續變更為不影響現有物件。The value of the property is set to the value of the property when the object is created; subsequent changes to have no effect on existing objects. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來檢查最大連接數目，物件可以進行到指定的統一資源識別元 (URI)。The following code example uses the property to check the maximum number of connections that the object can make to the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#4)]

span.span: The connection limit is equal to or less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConnectionName As String
public: property System::String ^ ConnectionName { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the connection name.

value.span: 表示連接名稱的 。

span.span: A that represents the connection name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果物件藉由呼叫建構多載引數，則屬性代表屬性用物件。If the object was constructed by calling a overload with a argument, then the property represents the property of the object used. 如果物件根據網路主機和連接埠，建構屬性包含字串，代表主機和網路連接埠。If the object was constructed from a network host and port, the property contains a string that represents the host and the network port. 如果屬性會從主機和連接埠，只有建構時設定物件具有相同值可以使用這個物件。If the property is set when constructed from a host and port, only objects with the same value can use this object. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentConnections As Integer
public: property int CurrentConnections { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得與這個 物件相關聯的開啟連接數。

span.span: Gets the number of open connections associated with this object.

value.span: 與這個 物件相關聯的開啟連接數。

span.span: The number of open connections associated with this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含與此相關聯的開啟網際網路連線的數目物件。The property contains the number of open Internet connections associated with this object. 值不能超過包含。The value of cannot exceed that of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來判斷與此相關聯的開啟網際網路連線的數目物件。The following code example uses the property to determine the number of open Internet connections associated with this object. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Expect100Continue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，用以判斷是否有使用 100-Continue 行為。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether 100-Continue behavior is used.

value.span: 預期 要求有 100-Continue 的回應，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to expect 100-Continue responses for requests; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為`true`，用戶端會要求使用`POST`方法預期收到 100-繼續回應的伺服器，表示用戶端應該傳送的回傳資料。When this property is set to `true`, client requests that use the `POST` method expect to receive a 100-Continue response from the server to indicate that the client should send the data to be posted. 此機制可讓用戶端，以避免透過網路傳送大量資料時的伺服器會根據要求的標頭，想要拒絕的要求。This mechanism allows clients to avoid sending large amounts of data over the network when the server, based on the request headers, intends to reject the request. 例如，假設屬性是`false`。For example, assume the property is `false`. 當要求傳送到伺服器時，它包含的資料。When the request is sent to the server, it includes the data. 如果在讀取之後的要求標頭，伺服器需要驗證，而且傳送 401 回應，用戶端必須重新傳送適當驗證標頭的資料。If, after reading the request headers, the server requires authentication and sends a 401 response, the client must resend the data with proper authentication headers. 如果屬性是`true`，要求標頭傳送到伺服器。If the property is `true`, the request headers are sent to the server. 如果伺服器已拒絕該要求，它會傳送 100-繼續回應信號資料可以傳輸。If the server has not rejected the request, it sends a 100-Continue response signaling that the data can be transmitted. 如果，就如同上述範例中，伺服器需要驗證，它會傳送 401 回應和用戶端已經傳送的資料。If, as in the preceding example, the server requires authentication, it sends the 401 response and the client has not unnecessarily transmitted the data. 變更這個屬性的值不會影響現有的連接。Changing the value of this property does not affect existing connections. 只會影響變更之後所建立的新連線。Only new connections created after the change are affected. 預期 100-繼續行為完全 IETF RFC 2616 一節所述 10.1.1。The Expect 100-Continue behavior is fully described in IETF RFC 2616 Section 10.1.1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IdleSince As DateTime
public: property DateTime IdleSince { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 取得 物件上次連接至主機的日期和時間。

span.span: Gets the date and time that the object was last connected to a host.

value.span: 物件，包含上次連接 物件的日期和時間。

span.span: A object that contains the date and time at which the object was last connected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性記錄的最後一個日期和時間的服務點已中斷連線從主機。The property records the last date and time at which a service point was disconnected from a host. 當目前的時間之間的差異和超過的值、物件可供使用的循環使用另一個連接。When the difference between the current time and exceeds the value of , the object is available for recycling to another connection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來設定和擷取日期和時間物件上次連接至主機。The following code example uses the property to set and retrieve the date and time that the object was last connected to a host. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxIdleTime { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與 物件相關聯的連接可以維持閒置的時間量，過了這段時間之後，連接即關閉。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time a connection associated with the object can remain idle before the connection is closed.

value.span: 與 物件相關聯的連接可以維持閒置的時間長度 (以毫秒為單位)，過了這段時間之後，連接即關閉，並供另一個連接重複使用。

span.span: The length of time, in milliseconds, that a connection associated with the object can remain idle before it is closed and reused for another connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定至，表示與相關聯的連接物件應該永遠不會逾時。You can set to to indicate that a connection associated with the object should never time out. 預設值屬性是值屬性時建立物件。The default value of the property is the value of the property when the object is created. 後續變更屬性有不會影響現有物件。Subsequent changes to the property have no effect on existing objects. 當連接相關聯是超過，連接會維持開啟直到應用程式會嘗試使用的連接。When the for a connection associated with a is exceeded, the connection remains open until the application tries to use the connection. 在這段時間，架構會關閉連接，並建立新的連接至遠端主機。At that time, the Framework closes the connection and creates a new connection to the remote host. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來設定及擷取閒置時間。The following code example uses the property to set and retrieve the idle time. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#3)]

exception.span: 被設定為小於 或大於 。

span.span: is set to less than or greater than .

summary.span: 取得 物件使用的 HTTP 通訊協定版本。

span.span: Gets the version of the HTTP protocol that the object uses.

value.span: 物件，包含 物件使用的 HTTP 通訊協定版本。

span.span: A object that contains the HTTP protocol version that the object uses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTTP 通訊協定版本為 HTTP/1.0 和 HTTP/1.1。The HTTP protocol versions are HTTP/1.0 and HTTP/1.1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ReceiveBufferSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個 所使用之通訊端的接收緩衝區大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the receiving buffer for the socket used by this .

value.span: ，包含接收緩衝區的大小，以位元組為單位。

span.span: A that contains the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer.

value.span: 預設值為 8192。

span.span: The default is 8192.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For additional information, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定這個屬性的值。The following code example sets the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLServicePoint/CPP/nclservicepoint.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLServicePoint/CS/nclservicepoint.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLServicePoint/VB/nclservicepoint.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定給設定作業的值大於 。

span.span: The value specified for a set operation is greater than .

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetTcpKeepAlive (bool enabled, int keepAliveTime, int keepAliveInterval);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetTcpKeepAlive(bool enabled, int32 keepAliveTime, int32 keepAliveInterval) cil managed
Public Sub SetTcpKeepAlive (enabled As Boolean, keepAliveTime As Integer, keepAliveInterval As Integer)
public: void SetTcpKeepAlive(bool enabled, int keepAliveTime, int keepAliveInterval);

param.name: enabled
param.span: 如果設定為 True，表示會使用指定的 keepAliveTime 和 keepAliveInterval 值啟用 TCP 連線的 TCP 保持連線選項。

span.span: If set to true, then the TCP keep-alive option on a TCP connection will be enabled using the specified keepAliveTime and keepAliveInterval values.

param.span: 如果設定為 False，則表示會停用 TCP 保持連線選項，並忽略其餘的參數。

span.span: If set to false, then the TCP keep-alive option is disabled and the remaining parameters are ignored.
The default value is false.

param.name: keepAliveTime
param.span: 指定第一個 Keep-Alive 封包傳送之前的無活動逾時 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: Specifies the timeout, in milliseconds, with no activity until the first keep-alive packet is sent.
The value must be greater than 0.

param.span: 如果傳遞的值小於或等於零，則擲回 。

span.span: If a value of less than or equal to zero is passed an is thrown.

param.name: keepAliveInterval
param.span: 指定若未接收認可，後續 Keep-Alive 封包傳送的間隔 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: Specifies the interval, in milliseconds, between when successive keep-alive packets are sent if no acknowledgement is received.
The value must be greater than 0.

param.span: 如果傳遞的值小於或等於零，則擲回 。

span.span: If a value of less than or equal to zero is passed an is thrown.

summary.span: 啟用或停用 TCP 連線的 Keep-Alive 選項。

span.span: Enables or disables the keep-alive option on a TCP connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以要求 TCP/IP 提供者使用的 TCP 連線的 keep-alive 封包。An application can request that a TCP/IP provider enable the use of keep-alive packets on a TCP connection. 預設為使用 TCP 連線的 keep-alive 封包會停用。The default is that the use of keep-alive packets on a TCP connection is disabled. TCP 通訊端時的預設設定初始化 2 小時的設定保持逾時和保持連接間隔為 1 秒。The default settings when a TCP socket is initialized sets the keep-alive timeout to 2 hours and the keep-alive interval to 1 second. `keepAliveTime`參數指定以毫秒為單位，與第一個 keep-alive 封包傳送之前的無活動逾時。The `keepAliveTime` parameter specifies the timeout, in milliseconds, with no activity until the first keep-alive packet is sent. `keepAliveInterval`參數指定的間隔，以毫秒為單位，介於時如果未收到收條，後續 keep-alive 封包會傳送。The `keepAliveInterval` parameter specifies the interval, in milliseconds, between when successive keep-alive packets are sent if no acknowledgement is received. 保持運作的探查數目不能變更，並設為 10。The number of keep-alive probes cannot be changed and is set to 10. 如果 TCP 連線中斷時持續作用，因為的會傳回到任何呼叫正在進行中通訊端，而且任何後續呼叫都會失敗並的。If a TCP connection is dropped as the result of keep-alives, a of is returned to any calls in progress on the socket, and any subsequent calls will fail with a of .

exception.span: 或 參數的指定值會小於或等於 0。

span.span: The value specified for or parameter is less than or equal to 0.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SupportsPipelining As Boolean
public: property bool SupportsPipelining { bool get(); };

summary.span: 指出 物件是否支援以管線連接。

span.span: Indicates whether the object supports pipelined connections.

value.span: 如果 物件支援以管線連接，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the object supports pipelined connections; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 管線可將用戶端可以透過持續連線傳送多個要求，而不等候來自伺服器的每個回應。Pipelining allows clients to send multiple requests across a persistent connection without waiting for each response from the server. 如已收到要求，伺服器會傳送回應相同的順序。The server sends the responses in the same order as the requests were received. IETF RFC 2616 8.1.2.2 節中詳細說明管線。Pipelining is described in detail in IETF RFC 2616 section 8.1.2.2. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseNagleAlgorithm { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，以決定是否在由此 物件管理的連接上使用 Nagle 演算法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the Nagle algorithm is used on connections managed by this object.

value.span: 表示使用 Nagle 演算法；否則為 。

span.span: to use the Nagle algorithm; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Nagle 演算法用來緩衝小型資料封包，並以單一封包。The Nagle algorithm is used to buffer small packets of data and transmit them as a single packet. 此程序，稱為 「 nagling 」 廣泛使用，因為它可以減少傳送的封包數目，並降低每個封包的額外負荷。This process, referred to as "nagling," is widely used because it reduces the number of packets transmitted and lowers the overhead per packet. 變更這個屬性的值不會影響現有的連接。Changing the value of this property does not affect existing connections. 只會影響變更之後所建立的新連線。Only new connections created after the change are affected. IETF RFC 896 的完整說明 Nagle 演算法。The Nagle algorithm is fully described in IETF RFC 896. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#9)]
